title: User Registration Success for Anesthesiologist and Secretary
description: Verify that new users can successfully register as anesthesiologist or secretary, receive confirmation email, and complete profile setup.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Fill registration form with valid details selecting anesthesiologist role
Submit registration form
Check that registration succeeds and confirmation email is sent
Confirm email via link in inbox
Verify email confirmation is successful and user is prompted to complete profile
Repeat the above steps for secretary role

title: Login and Logout Functionality for Both User Types
description: Verify login, protected route access, session expiry, and logout for anesthesiologists and secretaries.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid anesthesiologist credentials and submit
Verify successful login and access to anesthesiologist dashboard
Navigate to a protected anesthesiologist route
Access is granted
Logout from application
Verify user is redirected to login page and session is invalidated
Repeat steps with secretary user credentials
Simulate session expiry
Verify user is prompted to login again when accessing protected routes

title: Password Reset Flow
description: Validate forgot password and reset password functionality including validations and email delivery.

steps.description: Navigate to forgot password page
Submit registered email address
Check that password reset email is sent
Click on password reset link received in email
Enter new password and confirm
Verify password is updated and user can login with new password
Try reset password flow with unregistered email
Verify appropriate error message is shown

title: Dashboard Data Rendering and Interactivity
description: Test that anesthesiologist dashboard loads metrics, graphs, recent procedures and action buttons correctly.

steps.description: Login as anesthesiologist
Navigate to main dashboard
Verify metrics and graphs are displayed with real-time data
Check recent procedures list displays correct records
Click on action buttons (e.g., add new procedure, view reports)
Verify correct navigation and UI response
Test dashboard responsiveness on mobile and desktop screen sizes
UI adapts correctly with no loss of functionality

title: Procedures Management with OCR Data Capture
description: Verify creation, editing, searching and viewing anesthetic procedures including automatic OCR data extraction and image upload.

steps.description: Login and navigate to procedures page
Start new procedure registration
Upload image of medical label for OCR processing
Verify OCR extracts correct labels and fields auto-populate accordingly
Manually edit any OCR fields and save procedure
Procedure is saved and appears in procedures list with searchable metadata
Search for procedures by date, status, or keyword
Search results display correct procedures
Edit existing procedure and verify updates

title: Financial Module: Revenue and Expenses Management
description: Test recording incomes and expenses, updating statuses, viewing financial performance analytics and hitting financial goals.

steps.description: Login and navigate to financial module
Add new revenue entry with valid details
Revenue entry is listed with correct status and amounts
Add new expense entry
Expense entry is visible and totals update accordingly
Modify status of payment to 'paid' or 'pending'
Status update is reflected in UI and backend
Access financial analysis and performance charts
Charts render correctly with up-to-date financial data
Verify goal tracking updates appropriately

title: Reports Generation with Export in PDF and CSV
description: Validate customizable filters for reports, generation of reports with correct data, and exporting functionality in PDF and CSV formats.

steps.description: Navigate to reports page
Apply filters for date range, procedure type and status
Filtered report data is displayed accurately
Export report as PDF
Exported PDF contains correct data and formatting
Export report as CSV
CSV file contains accurate records matching filtered data
Test export with empty filter criteria resulting in full report
Complete report data exported successfully

title: Secretary Management and Permissions
description: Test ability of anesthesiologist to add secretaries, assign permissions, access secretary dashboard, and confirm correct permission enforcement.

steps.description: Login as anesthesiologist and navigate to secretary management
Add new secretary with unique email and assign role permissions
Secretary receives invitation email and can register
Login as secretary and access secretary dashboard
Secretary dashboard shows only permitted procedures and notifications
Attempt action not allowed by permissions
Access is denied with appropriate error
Verify auditing logs capture secretary management actions

title: Subscription and Payment Integration with Pagar.me
description: Verify subscription sign-up flow, checkout, payment processing, webhook updates, plan management and access control based on subscription status.

steps.description: Navigate to subscription plans page
Select plan and proceed to checkout
Complete payment through integrated Pagar.me checkout
Verify subscription creation and confirmation page displays correct details
Simulate webhook notification for successful payment
Subscription status is updated appropriately in system
Attempt access to premium features with active and inactive subscriptions
Access control is enforced based on subscription validity
Cancel subscription and verify UI and access updates

title: Real-time Notifications System
description: Test sending, receiving and displaying real-time notifications and alerts for both anesthesiologists and secretaries.

steps.description: Login and open notifications panel
Trigger system notifications such as new procedure added or payment update
Notification bell icon updates count in real-time
Notification list displays latest messages with correct content
Mark notifications as read and verify count updates

title: User Profile Settings and Account Deletion
description: Ensure users can update profile info, change preferences and delete their account with necessary confirmations.

steps.description: Navigate to user settings page
Update profile details such as name, contact info and preferences
Changes persist correctly and UI reflects updates
Initiate account deletion process
Confirmation prompt is shown to user
Confirm account deletion
User is logged out, data is removed as per privacy policy, and access revoked

title: Security and Privacy Compliance Tests (LGPD)
description: Validate encryption of sensitive data at rest and in transit, role-level security enforcement and data anonymization for privacy compliance.

steps.description: Attempt to access anesthesiologist data as secretary without permission
Access is denied according to role-level security policies
Inspect network traffic during authentication and data transmission
All data is transmitted over encrypted channels (HTTPS/TLS)
Review database storage to ensure sensitive fields are encrypted
Sensitive medical and financial data are stored encrypted as per LGPD
Test anonymization or deletion of data after account removal
User data is properly anonymized or deleted, supporting privacy requirements

title: Performance Testing for Key Routes
description: Ensure uptime of 99.9% and response times below 2 seconds for main routes including authentication, dashboard, procedures and finance.

steps.description: Simulate high load on authentication services
Response time remains under 2 seconds and no downtime occurs
Test dashboard data loading under concurrent users
Dashboard renders correctly within performance targets
Perform stress test on procedure management and finance modules
System remains stable and responsive

title: OCR Accuracy and Error Handling
description: Validate OCR extraction accuracy using Tesseract.js on various medical label image qualities and handle OCR failure cases gracefully.

steps.description: Upload high quality image with clear medical label
OCR extracts label data with expected accuracy
Upload low quality or rotated image
OCR performs best effort extraction and shows confidence or error message
Submit procedure with partial data from OCR
User can manually edit fields before saving

title: UI Responsiveness and Component Consistency
description: Verify UI components across the application render correctly on various devices, screen sizes and browsers, matching Tailwind CSS design system.

steps.description: Access all main pages (login, dashboard, procedures, finance, reports, secretary, subscription, settings) on desktop
UI components appear consistent, aligned and functional
Repeat above navigation and inspection on tablet and mobile devices
Layouts adapt without clipping or overlapping UI elements
Check interactive components like buttons, selects and modals respond appropriately
